column1: Name / Purpose
[title_desc name="Darkulator" desc="Adjust the light levels in a map" /]

[title_desc name="Super Half-Life Tools" desc="Update to ZHLT" /]
[title_desc name="Toolbox Lux RAD Editor" desc="Edit light values inside a Maps RAD file" /]

[title_desc name="UComplier" desc="Compiler and Decompiler rolled into one tool" /]

[title_desc name="Valve Batch Compile Tool" desc="Standalone Compiler for Source Maps" /]
[title_desc name="Valve Hammer Editor Compiler" desc="Standalone Compiler for GoldSrc Maps" /]

[title_desc name="Vgroup (Auto VisGroup'er)" desc="This tool can help you by grouping the map into VisGroups based on a grid." /]

[title_desc name="Xash studiomdl" desc="Modified Compiler with support for large models and textures" /]
[title_desc name="Zoners Half-Life Tools (ZHLT)" desc="Modified versions of the tools used in the Map compilation process" /]
[title_desc name="ZPackager" desc="this will pack every custom item into your map up to and including map over views" /]
[title_desc name="Half-Life  Quake3 Map Converter" desc="Convert maps between Quake3 and Half-Life" /]
[title_desc name="Source Compile Analyzer" desc="Analyzes and reports on errors in the map compilation process" /]
[title_desc name="Vert Alert" desc="Find, display, and optionally round floating point plane coordinates in Source engine .vmf files." /]

[title_desc name="Joiner" desc="Joiner is a little application that reads in a template .vmf file and produces a new .vmf filled with supports based on your template and customised settings or config." /]
[title_desc name="Compile Tracker" desc="Another great tool from RedMser which tracks Hammers compilation progress even when it seems to hang" /]
[title_desc name="TCG - Batch Compile GUI" desc="GUI frontend for Source compiling tools" /]
[title_desc name="VNIX Map Protector" desc="Small utility for helping protect bsp maps" /]
[title_desc name="Half Life Game Level Viewer" desc="DirectX based application to open and view Half Life 1 game files (Source Code)" /]
[title_desc name="Half-Life SpawnPointEditor" desc="This is the barebones program that GFlip uses as it's base" /]
[title_desc name="Instant Lammer Editor" desc="Well made Russian Level Editor for GoldSrc" /]
[title_desc name="VMF Instance Inserter" desc="Inserts instances into a map" /]
[title_desc name="Hammer VMF Helper" desc="Used to take source-css console commands and convert them into .vmf-compatible commands." /]
[title_desc name="Half-Life BSP Tools" desc="A nice tool made in 2015 which can come in handy sometimes when a bsp file is too large and wont work in BSPtoMAP.exe" /]
[title_desc name="Trimesh" desc="It is another type of solid which is perfect for creating terrain. A plugin for Hammer" /]
[title_desc name="Sledge JS" desc="A collection of JavaScript functions to load Goldsource and Source map files and render them. Not an editor." /]

[title_desc name="Hammer Floating Point Tool" desc="This tool blocks Hammer from converting plane coordinates to integers when exporting .map file and thus enables Hammer to output the original floating point coordinates." /]

[title_desc name="BrushGen" desc="This tool is used to create the smallest convex brush containing all points in the input file. Input file can be .smd (use its vertexes), .map (brushes and point entities) or .pts file." /]
[title_desc name="Hammer Launcher" desc="A tool for tweaking hammer settings and using multiple texture profiles" /]
[title_desc name="HL Compiled" desc="Batch compiler for automating Map Compilation" /]

[title_desc name="HL Labyrinth generator" desc="This program is a little tool for those that like the Half-Life game, with 
its amazing kind of enemies and weapons." /]
[title_desc name="Mapping Dev Texture Guides" desc="Some Dev Texture guides to aid with level creation" /]
[title_desc name="Plan Shape" desc="a 3D Shape Generator for the Quake & Half-Life Map Format" home_link="http://gibshooter.com/planshape/" /]
[title_desc name="HammerMate" desc="HammerMate is a tool I use to save and load the wad texture list for Hammer 3.4 / 3.5." /]
